Texts.Chs: 我没有为这个奇怪的地方做好准备。仅仅是呼吸空气就会导致精神敏锐度立即下降，轻微的幻觉在暴露于大气的几秒钟后就开始了。随着时间的推移，症状加重。在30秒内，我的思维能力明显下降，并且一度试图吞下自己的手指。
Texts.Eng: I was not prepared for the bizarre place. Simply breathing the air caused immediate loss of mental acuity, and mild hallucinations began mere seconds after exposure. As time progressed the symptoms increased in severity. Within 30 seconds I was substantially less capable of cohesive thought and at one point attempted to ingest my own finger.

Texts.Chs: 还好泰勒及时给了我镇静剂，阻止了我的理智完全丧失。我很懊悔，但当时我实在太饿了...有什么东西在迫使我立即不惜任何代价吃肉。我当时觉得我别无选择，只能服从。
Texts.Eng: Taylor was able to sedate me in time to prevent total loss of the digit in question. I regret it, but at the time I was just so hungry...something kept compelling me to eat meat at any cost, immediately. I felt that I had no choice but to obey.
